drinks.name: Martini
drinks.recipe: Mix 3 parts vodka & 1 part dry vermouth.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: A nice drink for a late night conversation.
drinks.recipe: Mix equal parts of gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.
drinks.serve: Serve cold, either on the rocks or straight up.

drinks.name: Gin and Tonic
drinks.description: Like regular tonic, but with gin.
drinks.recipe: Mix 2 parts gin & 1 part tonic water.
drinks.serve: Serve in a tall glass over ice, garnished with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Rye Whiskey
drinks.recipe: No recipe. Just pour from the bottle.
drinks.serve: Serve in a short glass. Large ice block optional.

drinks.name: Hot Tea
drinks.recipe: Soak tea leaves in hot water until desired strength
drinks.serve: Serve tea in kettle with a matching teacup

drinks.name: Pink Lemonade
drinks.serve: Serve in tall glass with ice and a long silly straw

drinks.name: Water
drinks.serve: Serve room temperature in any glass.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.recipe: Blend tequila, margarita mix, and ice!
drinks.serve: Pour in a glass rimmed with salt.

snacks.name: Nachos
snacks.recipe: Cover expensive, organic tortilla chips with Cheez Whiz.
snacks.serve: Serve in a hand-thrown ceramic bowl, garnished with canned black olives

snacks.name: Hummus
snacks.description: Sure to impress your vegan friends!
snacks.serve: Place unceremoniously on the table, along with pita bread.

snacks.name: Arugula and Walnut Salad
snacks.recipe: Mix arugula, toasted walnuts, and thinly-sliced Parmesan cheese. Dress with lemon and olive oil.
snacks.serve: Place on tiny, precious little plates.

snacks.name: Fritos
snacks.recipe: Buy the bag of chips from the store

snacks.name: Falafel
snacks.description: Delicious fried balls made of chickpeas and spices.
snacks.recipe: Buy the bag of premade frozen falafel balls from Trader Joes
snacks.serve: Serve on pita bread with tahini sauce and israeli salad.

snacks.name: Doritos
snacks.description: Delicious unhealthy chip that uses Red 40
snacks.recipe: Buy the bag of chips from the store
snacks.serve: Eat from the bag. You will need a napkin!

snacks.name: Doritoss
snacks.description: Delicious unhealthy chip that uses Red 40
snacks.recipe: Buy the bag of chips from the store
snacks.serve: Eat from the bag. You will need a napkin!
